section.title: Account
section.p: The account represents a person(s) or billable entity. The account entity controls or owns the monetary and billing cycle elements of the services and provides payment for subscriptions. An account provides for:

li.p: contact information for the account owner
billing cycle information for example: hour of day, day of week, and day of month attributes
a single monetary balance, which is associated to it at all times
creation of a set of custom data that is unique to the account
